remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 "取消 " 按钮 (其`CommandName`属性设置为 "取消" 的按钮) 时, 但在退出编辑模式之前,控件引发事件。The control raises the event when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before exiting edit mode. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理方法, 该方法执行自定义例程, 如在每次发生此事件时停止取消操作 (如果它会使行处于不需要的状态)。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递给事件处理方法, 该方法允许您确定包含引发事件的 "取消" 按钮的行的索引, 并指示应停止取消操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止取消操作, 请将属性设置`true`为。To stop the cancel operation, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用传递给事件处理方法的对象确定包含用户单击的 "取消" 按钮的行的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button clicked by the user.
